meta.name: description
meta.content: Indicate which charsets are acceptable in textual response content

main.p: The Accept-Charset header describes which character sets are acceptable in textual response content.
As most servers have standardized on using UTF-8, use of this header has disappeared. Since RFC 9110, use of this header is discouraged.

dl.dd: Indicates which character sets are acceptable in responses.
Content-Type (the character set of the media type)

main.pre: Accept = #( media-range [ accept-params ] ) media-range = ( "*/*" / ( type "/" "*" ) / ( type "/" subtype ) ) *( OWS ";" OWS parameter ) accept-params = weight *( accept-ext ) accept-ext = OWS ";" OWS token [ "=" ( token / quoted-string ) ]
